title: Tickets Tab (Wallet Page) Timeout
custom_preconds:
** Setup **
Charles is required for this testing. Charles has the ability to throttle/slow down network calls. You will need to setup Charles to throttle calls (Round Trip Latency MS) for the designated timeout period OR add a breakpoint on the response of the host call .

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.5.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user navigates to More Tab via bottom navbar 
AND engineer is throttling/blocking the response call(s) particular to the App page/call shown below

||| :Ballpark Page | :Host Call  
|| Tickets Tab (Wallet Page) | boxoffice.mlb.com

*above hosts are particular to Staging Env, for QA/Prod env determine the comparable host

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to the Ticket Tab via bottom navbar

(can also perform a pulldown gesture or 'Refresh My Tickets' button press to cause ticket api call)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN after 60s, the network call should timeout
AND a Network error message is shown 

[Android] 'Network unavailable, please check your connection' 
OR 
[iOS] 'Something went wrong, try again'

title: Team Tab Timeout
custom_preconds:
** Setup **
Charles is required for this testing. Charles has the ability to throttle/slow down network calls. You will need to setup Charles to throttle calls (Round Trip Latency MS) for the designated timeout period OR add a breakpoint on the response of the host call .

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.5.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user navigates to More Tab via bottom navbar 
AND engineer is throttling/blocking the response call(s) particular to the App page/call shown below

||| :Ballpark Page | :Host Call
|| Team Tab | api.mobile.mlbinfra.com

*above hosts are particular to Staging Env, for QA/Prod env determine the comparable host

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to the Team Tab via bottom navbar

(may need to select a new team to trigger api call, as the page may be cached already)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID] 
THEN after 60s, the network call should timeout
AND a Network error message is shown  

(i.e 'Something went wrong, try again')

[iOS] 
THEN after 60s, the network call should timeout
AND a Network error message is NOT shown

title: MLB Accounts Page (within MyProfile) Timeout
custom_preconds:
** Setup **
Charles is required for this testing. Charles has the ability to throttle/slow down network calls. You will need to setup Charles to throttle calls (Round Trip Latency MS) for the designated timeout period OR add a breakpoint on the response of the host call .

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.5.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND engineer is throttling/blocking the response call(s) particular to the App page/call shown below

||| :Ballpark Page | :Host Call
|| MLB Account page | profile.mlb.com

*above hosts are particular to Staging Env, for QA/Prod env determine the comparable host

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the MLB Account page, via Profile Icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN after 60s, the network call should timeout
AND a Network error message is shown 

(Both Platforms display prompt: 'Unable to Load - We were unable to load the latest information on your account.')

title: MyHistory Page Timeout
custom_preconds:
** Setup **
Charles is required for this testing. Charles has the ability to throttle/slow down network calls. You will need to setup Charles to throttle calls (Round Trip Latency MS) for the designated timeout period OR add a breakpoint on the response of the host call .

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.5.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user navigates to More Tab via bottom navbar 
AND engineer is throttling/blocking the response call(s) particular to the App page/call shown below

||| :Ballpark Page | :Host Call
|| MyHistory Page | api.mobile.mlbinfra.com 

*above hosts are particular to Staging Env, for QA/Prod env determine the comparable host

custom_steps_separated.content:
[ANDROID] 
WHEN the user navigates to the Profile page via Profile icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID] 
THEN the network call to retrieve the checkin summary counts should timeout

custom_steps_separated.content:
[ANDROID]
WHEN the user navigates to the MyHistory page via 'View Details' link within Profile card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID] 
THEN a Network error message is shown 

(i.e 'Something went wrong, try again')

custom_steps_separated.content:
[ANDROID]
WHEN the user performs pull-down gesture on the MyHistory page to trigger a fresh call
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID]
THEN after 60s, the network call should timeout
AND a Network error message is shown 

(i.e 'Something went wrong, try again')

custom_steps_separated.content:
[iOS] 
WHEN the user navigates to the Profile page via Profile icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS] 
THEN the network call to retrieve the checkin summary counts is NOT triggered

custom_steps_separated.content:
[iOS]
WHEN the user navigates to the MyHistory page via 'View Details' link within Profile card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS] 
THEN a Network error message is shown 

(i.e 'Something went wrong, try again')

custom_steps_separated.content:
[iOS]
WHEN the user performs pull-down gesture on the MyHistory page to trigger a fresh call
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS] 
THEN MyHistory page is shown with 'Loading your games ...' spinner in the center
AND the network call is triggered
BUT does NOT timeout
AND a Network error message is NOT shown

title: Upload Photo within MyHistory Timeout
custom_preconds:
** Setup **
Charles is required for this testing. Charles has the ability to throttle/slow down network calls. You will need to setup Charles to throttle calls (Round Trip Latency MS) for the designated timeout period OR add a breakpoint on the response of the host call.

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.5.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has a prev check-in already part of My History
AND user navigates to More Tab via bottom navbar 
AND engineer is throttling/blocking the response call(s) particular to the App page/call shown below

||| :Ballpark Page | :Host Call | :note
|| MyHistory Photo upload | api.mobile.mlbinfra.com | Android=180s / iOS=60s

*above hosts are particular to Staging Env, for QA/Prod env determine the comparable host

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to My History page, via Profile icon
AND the user navigates to a prev checked-in event on the MyHistory page via 'View Details' link within event card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the selected event details page is shown 
AND Add New Photos button/link is shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on 'Add New Photos' button/link
AND user selects Photo Library option from Choose Image bottom sheet
AND user selects any image
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[Android]
THEN after 180s, the network call should timeout

[Android]
THEN after 60s, the network call should timeout

AND a Network error message is shown 

(Both Platforms display 'Something went wrong, try again')
